item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Burst? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Burst? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price gained further and is about to reach $15.00. We need to wait and see reaction of ETH/USD if it tests the mentioned level. Ethereum price gained further and is about to reach $15.00. We need to wait and see reaction of ETH/USD if it tests the mentioned level.

item.title: Coinbase Becomes GDAX And Adds Ethereum and Litecoin Trading
item.description:
Coinbase Becomes GDAX And Adds Ethereum and Litecoin Trading

Coinbase/GDAX joins a very long list of Bitcoin exchanges who have added Ethereum in the past. Exciting times are ahead for Coinbase customers and Ethereum enthusiasts, as the exchange platform will support ETH trading soon. Additionally, the company will rebrand to GDAX, and the new website and logo will be coming soon.

item.title: Tech Bureau and NEM Develop Catapult Blockchain Engine
item.description:
Tech Bureau and NEM Develop Catapult Blockchain Engine

Tech Bureau Corp is one of the most prominent blockchain players in Japan, and their partnership with NEW will lead to the development of a new blockchain engine called Catapult. This new engine is an augmented and amended version of Mijin, which was also developed in partnership with NEM.

item.title: Have you tested blockchain technology on any businesses you have equity in?
item.description:
Have you tested blockchain technology on any businesses you have equity in?

Answer (1 of 2): Yes. I'm trying to use blockchain to keep track of my loans and trade financing deals, and it is a *PAIN*. I'm one of the developers of Hyperledger fabric, and getting the &^%&^% code to $#%$#%#$% do $%$&$^&% productive is a $#%$#% pain in the $%%^%$^.

item.title: Is bitcoin the most powerful currency?
item.description:
Is bitcoin the most powerful currency?

Answer (1 of 3): Thanks A2A The most powerful? Oh, really? it sounds like tricky and Utopian I guess. It's a lot like in 1900 you asked whether USD would be as powerful as Gold, making it become the most powerful currency in the world that dominates all the financial system.

item.title: Can I mine Bitcoin?
item.description:
Can I mine Bitcoin?

Answer: Don't bother. Not worth it. You can't make a profit with general purpose (non-ASIC) hardware. And even with free electricity it is so little that you could likely make more by using the time you'd need to set it up for filling out paying online surveys.

item.title: BTC Markets Announces Support For The DAO Token Trading
item.description:
BTC Markets Announces Support For The DAO Token Trading

The DAO is captivating audiences all over the world, and it has also attracted the attention of various exchange platforms. The token associated with this crowdsale will be tradeable across multiple platforms, and BTC Markets is one of the first to officially announced support for The DAO tokens.

item.title: Sydney Stock Exchange is Building a Public Blockchain System
item.description:
Sydney Stock Exchange is Building a Public Blockchain System

The recently founded Sydney Stock Exchange is turning to blockchain technology in developing a settlement system that will see it provide an open blockchain settlement platform, enabling any company or broker to use the blockchain. The Sydney Stock Exchange (SSX is building a blockchain solution for the private equity market in an effort to provide a low-cost alternative for venture capital funds.

item.title: 247exchange.com Now Allows Users to Buy Bitcoin through Card Payments in 5 Different Currencies
item.description:
247exchange.com Now Allows Users to Buy Bitcoin through Card Payments in 5 Different Currencies

Bitcoin Press Release: 247Exchange.com, the international cryptocurrency exchange now allows its Canadian and Australian customers to pay in Canadian Dollar (CAD) and Australian Dollar (AUD) through their credit and debit cards, saving them from the currency conversion charges.

item.title: Proof of Art: Bringing Bitcoin Advocacy to the Art Galleria
item.description:
Proof of Art: Bringing Bitcoin Advocacy to the Art Galleria

A Bitcoin-themed art event, Also read: What Happens If BTC Hits $10,000? Bitcoin Enthusiasts Respond Poof of Art , will be taking place on May 25th, 2016 in San Francisco, California. It will be hosted at Code and Canvas , which happens to be a specialized venue in the city dedicated specifically to hosting art events about technology.
